snippet.title: Quern - Undying Thoughts - Official Release Date Trailer 2016 | PC | MAC | LINUX
snippet.description:
Discover the truth about Quern’s past, unfold the mysteries of it’s present, and be the explorer who shapes its future. 

Quern introduces reusable puzzle mechanics to the classic genre, forcing the player to think about the game as a whole, and not just as a series of individual challenges.

Steam page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/512790/

GOG page: https://www.gog.com/game/quern_undying_thoughts

Webpage: http://www.querngame.com

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/querngame/

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/querngame
